uniandes.unacloud.agent.platform

Class VirtualBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniandes.unacloud.agent.platform.Platform
      • uniandes.unacloud.agent.platform.VirtualBox

  • public class VirtualBox
extends Platform
    Implementation of platform abstract class to give support for VirtualBox platform.
